oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of Mary Evelyn Bragg Stone
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Mrs. Stone was a member of the United Daughters of the Confederacy (UDC). She was the great niece of two soldiers. Pvt. George Harris, Co. E, 4th Tenn. Cav., CSA, served under Baxter Smith. Pvt. G. W. Harris entered service Sept. 20, 1863, deserted April 25, 1864, and took the oath of allegiance March 4, 1865. Her grand-uncle James Harris was killed at the Battle of Murfreesboro.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Stone, Mary Evelyn Bragg
